website_summaries.verdict: A good monitor for an excellent price.
pros: Includes built-in speakers and HDMI, DVI, and VGA inputs
Tilts backwards 15 degrees and 5 degrees forward
cons: The neck that goes into the base is not easily removable, which is awkward for wall mounting

customer_reviews.title: Good For Gaming
customer_reviews.text: I bought this monitor in order to play it with my Xbox One. It's a good Monitor, it wasn't what I expected honestly. You know "You get what you paid for". I feel like I got more than what I paid for since I'm able to play Dark Souls 3 with good graphics. It's a cheap Monitor but it's worth if if you're just using it to play games at your desk. Just incase you guys don't know, It has 1 HDMI Input Port 1 VGA Input Port 1 DVI Input Port I recommend this TV for anyone with a low budget looking for a good monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Proano

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Pi projects
customer_reviews.text: Great little monitor to do Raspberry Pi projects with. My only complaint is where the power port and HDMI ports are located. Instead of being located on the bottom of the monitor (where they could be tied together and hidden), they are located on the left and right of the components box, so your power cord and HDMI cable are hanging off the left and right of the monitor. It's just ugly is what I'm saying.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Brown

customer_reviews.title: AWFUL PRODUCT!! STOPPED WORKING AFTER A FEW MONTHS! DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Awful product! Within only a few months the has stopped working and displays a white screen only. I have tried with different cords, computers, etc. It is junk! Do not waste your money on this product - spend a little more and get a Dell, Samsung or LG that will last you years! I am so disappointed that I am not able to return this and get my money back. Awful!!
customer_reviews.author: FurMommy

customer_reviews.title: This monitor is great for the price
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is great for the price. Looks great. I use it for my PS4 and even my roku. I have two of these inside my garage. The stand is fully removable BTW. I saw some reviews about how the stand isn't removable but it is.. Look on youtube and there are ways. Took about 10 min for me to do.
customer_reviews.author: ALeGault

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT ORDER THIS!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is EXTREMELY temperamental. I have a MacBook Pro and it works with it when it feels like. I’ve tried two different docking stations and two different connection methods and both have the same result. You can connect and power it on the same way two different days and get different results. I’m returning it because it takes me 15-20 mins to get it working so I can do my schoolwork. UPDATE: 1 week past the return deadline it doesn't work at all. I asked for assistance and another customer just said to get my money back. Now it's too late. Don't make the same mistake I did...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's worth the price for sure, but i would never pay more money for this product.
customer_reviews.text: First off the first pic advertised is all wrong. The monitor itself looks nothing like that. The rest of the pics are correct. It's definitely smaller then what you would think and I'm pretty sure it's not a 20 inch screen. The resolution is pretty good though. i bought one for my office computer and it works for what i need it for and I'm about to buy another one to duel monitor. It's worth the price for sure, but i would never pay more for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this monitor for a computer I built for my office. At first I was getting a terrible picture tried cable that I was using on a monitor that had a great picture still bad. Went from that to no picture at all. I guess you get what you pay for I will not order another monitor on price alone.
customer_reviews.author: cpyne007

customer_reviews.title: The first day i got it. The blinking light ...
customer_reviews.text: The first day i got it. The blinking light turned on in the corner. It kept on turning off and would not connect to HDMI or anything else. It was just a black screen. If you get a blinking blue light return it and get your money back
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Duchardt

customer_reviews.title: Comes with screwdriver!
customer_reviews.text: I almost gave these 5 stars. Bought two for $65/ea. The come with a screw driver to attach the base but no extra screws. The come with a neat HDMI to DVI cable and a VGA cable. But NO HDMI TO HDMI CABLE. I had an HDMI cable and used that on one monitor. The picture is best on that monitor. I also had a displayport to DVI adapter. I used that on the other. The text is just a little blurry at the max 1600x900 setting. Might be able to make it better with some tweaking. all-in-all can't complain for the price as long as they last.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy L.

customer_reviews.title: craps out
customer_reviews.text: So I purchased this monitor less that 1 year ago on May 17, 2018 and just now, today i see the screen flickering as if the picture is going to go out. I haven't even had this monitor a year and already its about to go out. I use this monitor for work, its my second monitor and there is no warranty from this seller. When it comes to tech they should at least have a 1 year limited warranty. Its suppose to be brand new, but yet i don't even have a manufactures warranty either. I will never purchase from this seller or this brand of monitor again.
customer_reviews.author: Bridgette

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: The good thing about it, is its light weight. Easy to move around. The pit falls are the color and brightness. My old Sceptre X9S has a better picture than this and it's at least 15 years old. I purchased this monitor for my indoor surveillance cameras to replace the old Sceptre X9S. Even using the "User Preferences" I can not adjust the picture with in reason. It's very dark and very green. On the new monitor everything in my home is green. If I was using it on a PC, it would have gotten sent back. I'm now using the old Sceptre X9S on my second computer and it works better than the new one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is nearly impossible to read wording on the screen.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the screen to use with our I Am Responding program for a volunteer fire company. However, no matter the angle of viewing, the words are impossible to view. The lines, too, for that matter. The sound quality is very poor, unless it's directly in front of your face. However, position wise, nothing would improve picture quality, nor would the settings. Adjustments just made the product go from bad to worse.
customer_reviews.author: I like turtles

customer_reviews.title: Never ever purchase this
customer_reviews.text: This was a total waste of money. The screen started doing all sorts of weird things on the second day of use and then stopped working altogether. Nobody should ever pay the ridiculous amount that’s charged for a clearly damaged product.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Moin

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what I hoped it would
customer_reviews.text: Monitor does exactly what I hoped it would do. I'm using iton an Electronics workbench, so I needed a small footprint / monitor, to switch between a Linux laptop and a Raspberry Pi for development. Monitor switching between the two different HDMI inputs is easy with buttons on the back, picture quality is good, haven't really tested the sound yet but no complaints and for the price just can't beat it
customer_reviews.author: SDE

customer_reviews.title: Not the best value, but it's good overall.
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had done more shopping around. At a $99 price point, this isn't /quite/ worth is. This would be worth $80-$90. It's a good monitor that doesn't have any dead pixels after a year and still maintains good picture quality, but it's not the best picture quality for the price, it's not the highest frame rate for the price, and it's not the best known brand for the price. It's very middling which doesn't have anything unique or exciting to offer. Like I said, I wish I had done more shopping around before buying this one. It's a good monitor, don't get me wrong, but at this price point there are better options. Not many, but a few.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Castle

customer_reviews.title: Issues from the start - this is a piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: Had problems since the beginning. The stand does not completely snap into the base so the monitor is unsteady and tips over. But the real problem is the screen. There must be a short because the monitor does not present a clear and steady image. The monitor continuously flashes on and off and colors change with each flash. Yes I have checked all connections. I have only had this monitor for 10 days and it is going in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Pixton

customer_reviews.title: Great Value HDMI or VGA Led Monitor
customer_reviews.text: Just received it. It was well packed. Installing the stand, power, and cable were obvious. The stand is steadier than the stand on my previous 20" monitor. Picture is bright and clear, sound is fine for standard computer sound. The power button and controls are on the back on the rh side. I did not like that location at first, but it took only a few minutes to learn to use the buttons by touch. No problems at this point. Some buyers have complained of early failure in this monitor. If it proves to be unreliable I will come back and revise this review. (10-4-2018)
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Forget insyructions and tool that comes with it
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised when I open the box they included a nifty little screw driver and everything was well packed. I grabbed the sheet that said read this first. Installation instructions for the base. Well great except it wasn't for the base I received. Grabbed the base I do have and tried to figure out how it fit together. Well I have four bolt type things but only two holes no problem. The bolt things do not work with nifty screw driver...run around looking for something that will work with these bolt things..needle nose pliers were the only thing that would work.
customer_reviews.author: T Sayler

customer_reviews.title: Buy this!!
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this monitor for two weeks but so far I love it. I needed a second monitor to hook to my laptop to have multiple screens. I first went to Best Buy and they talked me into a ridiculously expensive monitor that I regretted immediately as I got home. I don’t need anything fancy. I looked on amazon and found this for a fraction of the price. 2 days later I received this and returned the Best Buy monitor. I did have to get an additional HDMI cord to connect this to my laptop but that was no big deal. So far everything is perfect
customer_reviews.author: Florida Lisa

customer_reviews.title: For this price it is a fantastic deal! If you get a working display.
customer_reviews.text: For this price it is a fantastic deal! It works just fine and I am very happy. It came on time and the package was not damaged. I bought another monitor same thing and the black colors were RED. So I returned it and they sent me another promptly. Now the new one does not display anything not even the menu settings when manually pressed. I swapped the HDMI from the working unit and still no luck. So 1 out of 3 monitors actually works great.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Good for home office work, not for gaming.
customer_reviews.text: Let me start saying, that this item had to be replaced once. The first one came defective out of the box, but since it was amazon who did the legwork, shipping was efficient and replacement came almost before I had shipped the original one back. Now for the second one, it has worked great. Its used for office work, on a daily schedule of 8 to 10 hours 5 days a week. So far no dead pixels, no problems with image quality nor brightness. I would recommend this to anyone looking for a quick monitor for home use with a low profile setup.
customer_reviews.author: Omar

customer_reviews.title: So glad I got this!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this monitor. It's great, with great picture and easy to install. The only thing is that the shipping was subpar. It came in the box that the monitor was packaged in with a label slapped on the side! I'm so glad it didn't get stolen during transit. Everyone could see exactly what it was, hence the 3 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: E. Paige Burks

customer_reviews.title: 9 days in and Dead Pixels
customer_reviews.text: I received my monitor on Valentine’s Day and I was thrilled because of the 75hz beautiful matte display and the easy set up and it was the perfect fit for my desk! My productivity was through the roof with a second monitor attached to my laptop! However a mere 9 days later after just simply sitting on my desk under moderate use and undergoing ZERO trauma I came back from Walmart and sat down at my desk and booted up and bam dead pixels in the top left corner. I was so excited and now so disappointed :/. Cannot recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dominic

customer_reviews.title: Love this monitor
customer_reviews.text: I love this monitor. My last one, after years of use, had one issue where it would sometimes make a high pitched noise and I'd have to turn the monitor off and back on to correct this issue. Then the screen broke while moving homes but I don't blame the monitor, it was mishandled I'm sure. Now I have what appears to be a new edition and so far I'm digging all the changes. I don't know how to explain it but I really prefer the way things look on this monitor over every monitor I've seen in person so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This monitor is... weird
customer_reviews.text: So I wanna start by saying I'm honestly not that picky. All I want is something thats not too bright. This monitor has a lot of cons and... virtually no pros. First of all, you need to change the settings as soon as you get it cause the default ones are terrible. If its too dim, any darker colors look black and its impossible to distinguish any black-on-dark text. if its too bright, a similar thing happens with white. The speakers are terrible, sooo bad, and the monitor doesnt tilt. The only good thing is the price. Dont get unless you want to be constantly fidgeting with settings!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this monitor for my son for gaming purposes, he’s only had it a week but so far so good!! The picture is nice, sound quality it good and it holding up to my standards. I was on the fence about ordering since there are mixed reviews, but so far I’m very pleased with my purchase. If anything changes I will be sure to update this review.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Merritt

customer_reviews.title: Not great, not awful
customer_reviews.text: It works for my purposes (monitor for showing the work schedule) but both that I purchased had a dead pixel out of the box. The plastic leg that people are complaining about is the old model, this newer model is removable (in fact it isn't installed out of the box. If you want to use it you snap it on). The Vesa mount works perfectly. People complaining about it not sitting flush simply aren't reading the instructions which clearly state to use the included adapter. If you don't need incredibly high definition or you plan on leaving this turned on until its death like me, it is the perfect cheap solution.
customer_reviews.author: Nick D

customer_reviews.title: Perfect For My Setup
customer_reviews.text: I use this monitor mostly as a second monitor for video or drawing references while I work on my laptop either writing or drawing. It's perfect for movies or for large mural-like setups of references. It's exactly what I wanted and works perfectly as my second monitor. My next step is hanging it on the wall and I don't see any problems with that. Setup was a breeze and for it to work all I have to do is plug the HDMI cord in. When I'm done I just turn it off and unplug. No issues. Loving the monitor and will gladly get more from Sceptre if I decide I want more. Perfectly happy.
customer_reviews.author: Papa Fargo

customer_reviews.title: Monitor isn't very big, but it suits my purposes well
customer_reviews.text: So I downsized to this monitor because I had problems with a bigger one, in which I often had a pink screen when I turned on my computer. Apparently, that problem has to do with what I'm doing, and not the monitor, since I've had it happen a couple times with this one, too. Nevertheless, I am very pleased with this monitor, and I think that for anyone who just needs a good one to use for browsing, movies, and maybe occasional gaming, this will do wonderfully. Especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Alex K

customer_reviews.title: Cheap But Good Laptop For When You Need One
customer_reviews.text: I keep an older Asus desktop around which I use for storage and some game playing. I recently lost my archaic monitor for it and needed a replacement. This one arrived within just two days, was easy setup, and connected easily. It is a bit small but it's easier on my desktop graphics. It is also much better in terms of power consumption. The only drawback is that the power button is behind the monitor and I frequently grab to shift the screen and end up turning it off by accident. But I think that's pretty minor.
customer_reviews.author: Thaddeus7

customer_reviews.title: Good product for price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a second screen for my laptop but now it currently is my main monitor for my new desktop. I like it better as a second screen then the main one. Plan on using it as portal able monitor when I buy a bigger one and that is how it was mostly used before with my ps4/switch. I really like this product the speakers are not very good but it has speakers so that is always a plus. It has 2 hdmi which is wonderful feature for any monitor to have around this price. I plan on buying Spectre again since I like this model so much.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Hooked this monitor up to Amazon Fire TV Stick and Raspberry Pi 3 B+. Works great. No issues. Writing this review using Raspberry Pi. Was pleasantly surprised at the video quality, given the price. Very easy to set up. Only needed instructions for using the controls. The only down side is the sound quality, which is just average and what you would expect with a monitor. Has output for external speakers. Exceeds my expectations for a $70 monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Karen S

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Complement to my Laptop
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this monitor so that I could have a dual screen experience with my laptop and also have a larger screen than my laptop screen. The monitor is clear, and it is very easy to set up. The resolution and sound quality could be just a bit better. This extra monitor is great for office work or school work. I have been using this monitor for about a year, and I would buy it all over again. However, I do not recommend it for graphic design or gaming.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hummer

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money. Bought it in February, it quit working this week. I emailed their customer service and haven't heard a thing from them. Spend your money on more dependable hardware because this one will quit on you after a very short time.
customer_reviews.author: Bentimber

customer_reviews.title: Very nice monitor
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a supplemental monitor for my laptop on a stand-up desk. The first one I received was DOA, but was quickly replaced by a fully-functional one. I have not tried out the speakers, since I use a subwoofer speaker set-up. The picture is crisp and clean, the monitor is responsive, and it fits my needs exactly. Great bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Ball

customer_reviews.title: Great Monitor
customer_reviews.text: The monitor came with a VGA cable a Philips screw driver for mounting. Very good instructions are included they appeared to be written by a person that English is their first language. The monitor is lite weight a good thing for wall mounts and swing out mounts. The picture quality is good and plenty bright. All in all not a whole lot of money but you receive a whole lot for your money. I would buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer in Mazo

customer_reviews.title: good deal
customer_reviews.text: for the price i find it a good deal so far ,it's a little misleading in the size,by rights,my old 17" screen is bigger than this one,i really don't like the download or what ever it's doing to work ,to many steps to go through,this isn't new tech,this is going backwards,because of the hook up and it's difficult and poor hook up and miss leading in size i rate it low,even tho it does work good
customer_reviews.author: steven oliver

customer_reviews.title: It's very cheap, understand that and you are fine.
customer_reviews.text: This is not a great monitor. It's refresh rate is bordering on slightly uncomfortable, and I have had cell phones that weigh more than the monitor does stand and power brick included... I am pretty sure I could crumble this thing in mu hands. But... It is very very cheap. And if you need something that will do the job for as little money as possible, this is not a bad way to go.
customer_reviews.author: W. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Color is too saturated and too bright
customer_reviews.text: I really wish I'd returned this monitor when I still could because I find the colors far too saturated to the point that I can't see fine details in any pictures/videos. Also, even at the lowest brightness setting and darkest color mode, the screen is uncomfortably bright. On the bright side, I've used it for the past 2 years without any issues which for me is not a great thing cos I kinda wish it'd break down on me so I'd have a better excuse to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Don't do it! Read here first.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these for a dual monitor setup (and along with using my laptop, I have three screens total). One seems to work fine, but each time I plug my laptop back in when arriving at the office daily, one of the screens is blurry and the screens display is way off Each. And. Every. Time. I. Use. It. I. Must. Restart. The. Dang. Monitor. Huge waste of time. Nobody else in the office has this issue with any of their other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Can't use with VESA
customer_reviews.text: Says VESA compatible, but the stand connector is raised on the back, making it very difficult if not impossible to use. Called their tech support and they didn't even have specs on this monitor and wanted to call me back. Yikes. Spend a little more and get a name brand Samsung, Acer, etc.
customer_reviews.author: E. Milewski

customer_reviews.title: Decent monitor, love using it vertically for coding
customer_reviews.text: The screen is pretty good, especially considering the price. The first screen we got had several dead pixels but Amazon got us a replacement quickly and got the old one shipped back for free. So just a fair warning. The monitor also has issues with the border boundaries after it turns on from sleep mode. You have to turn the monitor off and turn it back on then it’s fixed. Easy enough, not worth shipping back over. The VESA mount makes it great for using it as a vertical monitor for things like coding. Honestly for the price it’s kinda hard to beat.
customer_reviews.author: Tanner Howell

customer_reviews.title: Nice monitor, if you like 9x16, but arrived scratched.
customer_reviews.text: This monitor was a really good deal price-wise! And it works fine. Picture is good with the HDMI connection. But the screen has two parallel scratches, middle-top, about 1/2" long vertically. I unpacked it very carefully, and there was no damage to the packaging, so it was packed that way. I complained to Amazon and they gave me a small partial refund, which makes it feel better. But the scratches are most visible when the unit is on...
customer_reviews.author: BlueAZ

customer_reviews.title: Beyond happy with monitor
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this monitor!! It’s such an affordable monitor that offers hdmi and vga which I love. ALSO it comes with a magnetic screwdriver to complete installing the mount which I mean COME ON who does that?!? I was so overjoyed to see that and not have to dig around my tool bag for the right size screwdriver, it’s the little things lol
customer_reviews.author: craus

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy for the price!!!!
customer_reviews.text: First let me say I am not one of these people that are obsessed graphics quality. Having said that this is an excellent monitor for the price. I wanted something I could mount in my hobby room as a spare. I could use as a back up for my lap top or those rare occasions when I wanted to use more than one monitor. I also use this for my x-box and for ham radio. Which was possible because it comes with all 3 possible inputs. NOT all monitors do. Also I liked it came with per-installed taped holes for a wall mount. Which I liked because it didn't take up space on my work bench.
customer_reviews.author: Elan2016

customer_reviews.title: For CCTV Use
customer_reviews.text: You cannot beat the price for your CCTV system - two HDMI input slots are a huge bonus as well! I ma using this monitor with our Reolink 8MP wireed bullet security cameras; it has speakers as well. Note, this is not a high-end gaming monitor, but it can clearly support that function as well if you're in a tight financial budget.
customer_reviews.author: COAST1E

customer_reviews.title: Great value for what you get!
customer_reviews.text: I currently use this for my monitor on my Home Security system. Picture is SUPER clear. I love the fact that this has all the different inputs that you can use. This is placed in my office and there isn't a lot of space so the built in speakers aspect works PERFECT for me. They are clear and work really well. I will definitely purchase this again especially for this price!
customer_reviews.author: Kendric S.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent monitors for Raspberry Pi
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for my Raspberry Pi4 and they are just perfect. Also got a two-armed stand for mounting. As others have mentioned, the neck for the mounting base can't be easily removed, but I don't find that a problem. For the price it's a great little monitor with 2 HDMI ports and a VGA port for older devices. Perfect for my use.
customer_reviews.author: Dave WA0TTNTop Contributor: Arduino

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: This monitor was a real great buy, I'm satisfied with everything about it. All the product descriptions are accurate and provide all of what comes with this purchase. The only thing that sucked about this product is the sound quality, which isn't great. So if you're gaming without a headset, (why the heck would you be gaming without a headset in the first place) this monitor isn't for you.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel V.

customer_reviews.title: Seriously Worth The Price
customer_reviews.text: Obviously not the greatest monitor in the world but I am seriously impressed by the quality of this $70 monitor. The sound is pretty darn tolerable (see video attached) and the picture is not bad at all.
customer_reviews.author: sean taylor

customer_reviews.title: A Bargain!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly. It's clear and bright and very light weight. Plugged it in and it's working fine via an HDMI 1 cable I already had. It also has an HDMI 2 port and a VGA port. It comes with a VGA cable if you need it. Nice set of controls on the lower right back corner.
customer_reviews.author: hojgard

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional value. The picture quality is outstanding
customer_reviews.text: Exceptional value. The picture quality is outstanding. I bought the monitor for a little used computer, it's such a high quality 20" display, I instead have it on my main home computer. The controls are easy to see and access. It works flawlessly. This Screen is worth for more than it's sold for. You will be glad you bought it. I am.
customer_reviews.author: USA gentleman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit for Small Home Office
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical. But this fit perfectly on the wall mount arm and easily enables connecting two laptops to the monitor. While I have to manually switch between them based on which laptop am I running as dual monitor at the moment, the size, weight, brightness, and clarity are all great combinations for what I use. Highly recommend this to anyone wanting it. Use the desk stand that comes with it or mount it on a wall mount arm. It won't disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: rattler0812

customer_reviews.title: Worked for 6 hours
customer_reviews.text: I didn't expect much for such a cheap product and I got even less, the resolution while it worked was serviceable, the audio output was on the lower end of medium quality. But within 6 hours the product stopped functioning. Black screen straight up which flashes in for about two seconds, with what it should be displaying so It isn't on my end. Monitor is on, it just isn't displaying anything which is the purpose of a computer monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Tag Nomer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible monitor
customer_reviews.text: I bought this monitor due to the great reviews and low price point. It only works about 1/3rd of the time. When I turn on the monitor it immediately says "no signal" and within 3 seconds it goes into sleep mode. I then have to turn the monitor off, back on, and hope it works. I've tested this with a desktop PC and a PS4 and the same thing happens. Extremely disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Doucett

customer_reviews.title: Sceptre is a great co only and I love their products
customer_reviews.text: Sceptre is a great co only and I love their products, I have had great luck with 2 televisions from them and one I bought in 2011 is still running very strong. Love the monitor but it came with a dead pixel. Come on sceptre, not very cool. Still contemplating sending it back for another maybe I’ll have better luck. I ordered two monitors one HP 22cwa and the sceptre as my secondary screen. I wish I would have ordered two of the HP ones. Luckily I’ll just use the sceptre at work where the dead pixel won’t bother me. Disappointed but the price was good.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter G.

customer_reviews.title: 59" HDMI Cable
customer_reviews.text: Not using it for gaming, so cannot rate that. Using it for a Second Computer Screen. It did not say in the description but it came with a 59 inch HDMI Cable. I always buy gaming computers because that the best way to get a fast computer. Which can also be used for photo editing.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Hinderliter

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! Perfect for movies or school work or office work!
customer_reviews.text: so far so good, had this for around 2 weeks and i just like it so much, i wake up every morning just wanting to turn it on and watch something haha can't beat the price and quality. not compatible with portrait view fYI but i don't need that, five stars. Amazing product. Definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Navakid Productions

customer_reviews.title: Honestly great picture quality and price
customer_reviews.text: This is an absolutely amazing image for the price. Great purchase and came with its own HDMI. Only thing that may be of concern for some is that the installed speakers are very soft but honestly it’s not the reason I bought them. I was more concerned with image quality and it’s a great monitor
customer_reviews.author: Michael Norberg

customer_reviews.title: Listen, don't speak.
customer_reviews.text: This monitor works great and is a great price, but has horrible speakers. Max volume on the monitor and in the volume controller - you literally need to lean in to hear it. Don't buy this is you want to use it for sound too, invest in speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Rakowski

customer_reviews.title: Overall i am pleased with this product
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is a nice size but not the best resolution. It works great as a home computer that you don't work on for long periods. I use it as a home computer storage computer. It was mailed through USPS in a large box with bubble wrap. It shipped within 5 days. Overall i am pleased with this product
customer_reviews.author: Supernatural9

customer_reviews.title: Leave room for the power brick/wall wort. These are fed by a low voltage line. I have two.
customer_reviews.text: The picture is very bright. I had to tone it down a bit for my eyes. I do have 2 so that might be my problem. Comes with a VGA cable each. I'm running one HDMI to HDMI and the other DVI to HDMI. No obvious difference in the picture. I haven't tried the sound but I wouldn't expect the tiny speakers to be any good for anything but system sounds. An inexpensive two speaker and subwoofer set would be a good investment if you don't have your own sound set up already. Just leave room for the power blocks to blug in.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Misleading pictures
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't show but there is a useless metal bulge on back so you cannot mount this monitor to a monitor stand without some sort of extension.
customer_reviews.author: william

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor for home security system
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive, and worked immediately upon power up with video source available. For some reason my monitor does not have the base for the stand. I have the arm that attaches to the back of the monitor. But the base shown on Page 9 of the assembly instructions is missing. All the items appeared packaged from new (i.e. does not look like a return) so I have no idea how the base disappeared.
customer_reviews.author: F-35 EWO

customer_reviews.title: Good cheap monitor
customer_reviews.text: It's a good cheap monitor. I use this as a third monitor for hosting my Outlook and music. I have two 27" monitors for all my work stuff and like keeping my Outlook open while at work. I wouldn't consider this small of a monitor for any work related stuff, but then again, I wear reading glasses for small print.
customer_reviews.author: TwistedAdmin

customer_reviews.title: Nice monitor great price.
customer_reviews.text: I have no complaints about this monitor. I use it primarily for work as a second monitor to a laptop but I'm sure you could use it for about anything. Variety of inputs. Easy to connect. Color coded connection types. I get a good picture from it. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Guy Buying Stuff

customer_reviews.title: no clue what happened
customer_reviews.text: I was happy with this monitor until this morning. I turned it on and found this almost perfect black circle in the bottom left corner. There is nothing on my desk that could have hit the screen and caused this. There are also two additional smudges with the same discoloration(?). I was actually planning on buying a second one but I'll go with a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: aaa

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: These are the perfect size for my desk and I have mounted them on a dual monitor holder that I purchased separately. The sound quality is good and the picture is excellent. I only wish the control buttons were located on the front rather than the back so I can see to adjust them while sitting at my desk. Otherwise these were a great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Gadgtgirl

customer_reviews.title: Colors are great, connects easily to my laptop
customer_reviews.text: For the price this can't be beat. I wanted a cheap 2nd monitor so I could work a second screen off my work laptop, but didnt want to spend alot because I work was not reimbursing me. This has worked seamlessly. Colors are great, connects easily to my laptop, really no issues whatsoever. Very pleased overall.
customer_reviews.author: J. Medina

customer_reviews.title: Save your cash
customer_reviews.text: I originally got this monitor for a cheap portrait monitor for coding. The viewing angles were so bad that unless I held my head in a specific place (8 inches directly in front of the screen), I couldn't see anything. Just save your money and buy a decent brand.
customer_reviews.author: Remy

customer_reviews.title: Works great and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I have an Apple Laptop. I'm always amazed how easy it is to use plug-in items. Set up was extremely easy and the company even includes a small screwdriver. I plugged it into my computer, turned it on and it worked immediately. I happened to have the HDMI connection cable, so you'll need to make sure you have the one you need. But it's a great monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Prof J

customer_reviews.title: Works amazing for school
customer_reviews.text: I just received it today so granted everything is working so far. The box got delivered right on time. Inside has the base and even mounting screws PLUS a screwdriver (very nice add!). Turned it on an good quality! It’s definitely not as clear as my MacBook but as an additional screen for reading my textbooks, it does great for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Nancie

customer_reviews.title: Monitors work great except the pedestal it comes on is terrible and ...
customer_reviews.text: Monitors work great except the pedestal it comes on is terrible and cheap.. so when you mount it... the pedestal doesn't come off just the base so it has a weird projection off the pedestal: I wish I could break it off.
customer_reviews.author: amber walls

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good For A Cheap Computer Monitor
customer_reviews.text: I bought 8 of these for my office task computers and they have worked flawlessly.....with the exception of one that didn't live through the big Alaskan earthquake a year ago. A year later, they are about the same price with some minor changes to the stand that allows it to be completely removed. HDMI....easy hookup. I'm still sold. I wouldn't recommend it as a game screen, but no surprise there, I don't think.
customer_reviews.author: Smedlow

customer_reviews.title: Good second monitor!
customer_reviews.text: When I first purchased this monitor, I loved it! Great bright colors and was super easy to get set up. Less than 12 hours of having it, the screen started to glitch and break up with random lines. I was extremely disappointed by this since I hadn't even used it at this point. I called customer service, they sent me a new one, and I haven't had any issues since! It's a great monitor, not sure what was up with the first one.
customer_reviews.author: Kiersten

customer_reviews.title: Does what I wanted it to do
customer_reviews.text: Needed an inexpensive monitor for streaming a Nintendo Switch with a Macbook (not an ideal setup, I know). Found this cheap monitor and it looked promising. Shipping was extremely fast without Prime since this was from Genesis Store. Got it the next day! Setup was really easy and included a screwdriver. I’m a very casual gamer and this does exactly what I wanted it to. Love the compact size and will be getting a wall mount for it. If I ever need an upgrade I for sure will find something from Sceptre. I’m very impressed with the quality for so cheap!
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: everything that you would expect...
customer_reviews.text: when I first received this monitor, I was thrilled! it is thin, light, and bright. however, within an hour of use, I had (and still have) multiple stuck pixels. that being said, if you can get over that, the picture quality is quite good, and easy to set up. just disappointing that I have to have multiple green and red dots throughout the screen.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandr

customer_reviews.title: Bought this by mistake and did not read description carefully, It's not compatible for.....
customer_reviews.text: Bought this by mistake and did not read description carefully, It's not compatible for Raspberry Pi 1,2, 3 and B+, Not compatible with other devices except Mac OS High Sierra, Mac OS El Capitan, Windows 10, 7, 8, 9, so basically it works only with old version mac and windows. if you have these computers only and want this computer monitor screen set, then don't worry it will work with your windows 10 or older mac computer. but I recommend using windows computer with this monitor screen set, because Apple just keep making software updates and version upgrades for mac computers and this computer monitor may stop detecting a signal from your mac or luckily it may not.
customer_reviews.author: Dimitri

customer_reviews.title: Great for smart mirror project
customer_reviews.text: 0 experience with the raspberry pie/making stuff in general, and I was able to make my first smart mirror using this monitor. A bit hard to remove the plastic and it felt scary prying off the plastic edges, but It was never meant to be disassembled. 5 Stars!
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: So far so good only been up a week but no problems as ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good only been up a week but no problems as of yet, I use it for my Security camera's and Video's are crystal clear. Color and Hue are pretty much right on with no adjustments right out of the Box, for the price there can be no complaints. one of the best features are the three different video connections, just wish I hadn't gone cheap on the cameras so I would have Sound to see what the speakers sound like on the monitor, also it did come with the HDMI cable that one reviewer claimed it didn't.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew W.

customer_reviews.title: Great for PC/Console Set Up
customer_reviews.text: The only downside is the speaker quality. It's hard to hear things, and I have it on 100% volume. Headphones or CC subtitles helps out tremendously! Other than that, I love the large screen, and it's easy to assemble. It fits my multi-tasking set up perfectly! Just so y'all know: PS4/XBOX (even 360 with an HDMI cable) will work with this monitor. Setting up everything is as you would with a tv, just plug in the power cable for the monitor and the HDMI cable. The monitor should automatically load the input. No need for conversion cables.
customer_reviews.author: Amia

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Come With VGA Cord.
customer_reviews.text: I use this monitor for my desktop. I love it. It feels like it has actually sped up my computer a little bit because it's a newer monitor than the one I was using. My old one was a dell monitor from 2001. I like it a lot. It fits very well at my desk which is under a bookcase.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Majda

customer_reviews.title: More than I was hoping for
customer_reviews.text: More than I was expecting to be honest. I was using a 24" TV with 720p and bought this as a replacement. 1600 x 900 resolution, 2 HDMI ports, came with cable, tools, everything. I always said the devil hides in the details and to be honest they though about every detail, from packing to user friendly and great great quality. Thin, light, good price! You could not ask for more. Adaptive sync with my Radeon card and I can reacha resolution of 3200 X 1800!!!
customer_reviews.author: Andres Cobos

customer_reviews.title: Great picture quality
customer_reviews.text: A budget monitor for my brand new PC and definitely worth a pick up until you get a 1920x1080p monitor. Great picture quality, awesome responsive timing, and easy to set up. However, the buttons should’ve been horizontal instead of being verticals and the brightness is weird on this monitor. Also, there was no need to have to press the button where on other monitors nowadays you can just hover over the option and it will apply it for you. Other than those flaws, great budget monitor for editing and gaming. Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Trollface@teleworm.us

customer_reviews.title: Satisfactory
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. Only drawback: the monitor attaches to the stand at a fixed angle (vertical). I would like the angle to be adjustable; I plan to put a block of wood under the base to raise it a bit. HDMI cable was included.
customer_reviews.author: Robert A. Saunders

customer_reviews.title: comes with screwdriver. its the little things
customer_reviews.text: Uses in the barracks while deployed with my Xbox and it was great. Breakdown and setup are easy. The box it comes in is great for travel and it comes with the required screw driver which is great for hotels and overnights when you can't use the hotel TV
customer_reviews.author: Neechee Kodo

customer_reviews.title: How Many Dead Pixels?
customer_reviews.text: The first day I turned it on it had a dead pixel and one pixel with a brightness issue, but because it has less than 3-5 pixels, it's considered within advertised quality or whatever. I'd recommend getting a different monitor for a little more money.
customer_reviews.author: Fairchild Cosplay

customer_reviews.title: Great, until you lose power cord
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor.... Until the power cord disappeared. It's super difficult to find a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: MistressGM

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my application
customer_reviews.text: I needed a monitor for my home security video cams. They are 1080p and the NVR has an HDMI connector. The cameras also have audio capabilities so I needed a monitor with built in speakers. This monitor was a cost effective fit for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Wright

customer_reviews.title: Poor connectivity, dead pixel
customer_reviews.text: This monitor will not stay selected on VGA input, and the buttons only work maybe a quarter of the time I press them, so trying to get it set up to work with my laptop takes 20+ min every time I unplug it from my laptop for any reason. 2 stars because it does work ok once it is set up. Additionally, dead pixel straight out of the box, but since I waited too long to set it up I was past the return window. Definitely won't be buying Sceptre again, worth spending more to get something that actually does what it is supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great for casual gaming
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this in my dorm room for my PS4. Comes with several cords but I only needed the HDMI and the power outlet to get my PS4 working. Also comes with audio output, and also a built-in speaker that works perfectly fine if you're at sitting distance from the monitor. Sound and graphics work fine, I'm not much of a techs person but this works perfectly to play games on casually :)
customer_reviews.author: Emil Adrias

customer_reviews.title: Good for IPS monitor
customer_reviews.text: Using this as a secondary monitor for my desktop. This is an IPS panel monitor so the color is far from accurate making it no the best for gaming or photo/video editing. General use or secondary monitor use will work good
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: Good piece of technology, after all, what can you expect of a $68 TV Screen. I wouldn't recommend it to game, but to watch movies, and play basic games it's good, although If you want to play video games like CS:GO go ahead, it's not a bad experience, but as I said before, not recommended (You'd rather spend $100 on a better TV Screen/Monitor.)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A good purchase
customer_reviews.text: The screen went out on my laptop on which I view my wifi security cams. I hated to purchase another laptop since the computer portion still worked so I ordered the Sceptre E series monitor. It arrived the next day and I hooked it up. It's been working great ever since. It's a larger screen than my non working 15.9 inch laptop screen and the colors are vibrant with a sharp picture. A Good purchase
customer_reviews.author: Davo68

customer_reviews.title: out of the box great especially with very inexpensive 4 year warranty
customer_reviews.text: I see complaints about color quality but what do you want for $66. especialy with 4 year warranty. Glossy large type manual. you cant tilt it. I bought it because i could never see the entire screen, All important information seems to be on the right side. So, i had to move the bar over on my 12 inch screen. Everything is great so far.
customer_reviews.author: BMiller

customer_reviews.title: amazing monitors with good picture quality
customer_reviews.text: amazing monitors with good picture quality, comes with generous hdmi cable. Speakers are low quality but that is expected, nevertheless they also work perfectly and were plug and play. would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: john trollston

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: It would be a good value if it worked. ordered one. Worked for about 2 minutes. Then, using known to work cables and both a 2017 Mac Book and a Lenovo X1 5th gen running Linux, the monitor wasn't recognized by the OS and never displayed anything. A replacement arrived two days later. Same result. Not worth the hassle. Avoid.
customer_reviews.author: vanden

customer_reviews.title: amazing
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product for about a year now, I've been in love with it ever since, 75hz matches my pc perfectly for gaming, and the quality of this monitor is amazing, the bezels are small and the screen is perfect size for myself. 24" always seemed too large to me, but this one is an extremely good fit.
customer_reviews.author: Bobzilla jones

customer_reviews.title: Very light weight
customer_reviews.text: Good monitors. I purchased two for my home office. They are very light weight compared to a previous Dell monitor I had. Wish the buttons were located on the front of monitor instead of behind as I turn them off after use. But that is only my personal preference and didn’t pay attention to that detail when purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Klashorst

customer_reviews.title: HDMI Input stopped working after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: As far as the monitor quality is concerned, I think this monitor is a fair match for its price. Nothing fancy, but it get the job done. However, after 6 months, the HDMI input completely stopped working rendering it pretty much useless, and for that... I'm out.
customer_reviews.author: Reba T

product_meta.title: Sceptre E205W-1600 20" 75Hz Ultra Thin LED Monitor HDMI VGA Build-in Speakers, Metallic Black (2018 version)
product_meta.description: Style:SingleWhether you are a gamer or a movie buff, the Sceptre e205w-1600 monitor is the way to go. 1600 x 900 resolution delivers vivid colors and sharp images on a 19.5” diagonal corner to corner inch screen. A 5 millisecond response time displays action sequences with the highest Degree of clarity. Enjoy HDMI, and VGA inputs to connect all video and gaming devices. Viewing Angle = 170 degree (Horizontal) / 160 degree (Vertical) [CR>10]
feature_bullets: HDMI, DVI or VGA Input. Power Range :100 – 240 VAC, 50/60 Hz, 1.1A (Max). (optional, need an external HDMI-DVI adapter)
VESA Wall Mount Ready. OS Compatibility- Windows 10, Windows 8, Windows 7, macOS High Sierra, macOS Sierra, OS X El Capitan

High Contrast Ratio: 5,000,000: 1.20 inches LED HD+ Monitor (19.5 inches Diagonal corner to corner). Dimensions With Stand (Inches) 18.01 x 7.17 x13.57 (inches). Without stand: 18.01 x 2.17 x 13.47(inches)
Build in dual Speakers. Signal compatibility : Digital Signal Frequency 30 – 80 kHz (Horizontal) / 60 – 75 kHz (Vertical)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars2,787 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
